data.name: AniDbIllegalInputOrAccessDenied
data.value: "Detected Illegal Input or access is denied"

data.name: AniDbBanned
data.value: Client is currently banned, wait for the AniDB API to cooldown before trying again

data.name: AniDbInternalServerError
data.value: An unknown error with the server has occurred

data.name: AniDbOutOfService
data.value: AniDB is currently experiencing service issues, try again later

data.name: AniDbServerBusy
data.value: AniDB's servers are currently overloaded, try again later
